page.title: 08Employment
page.content: Of all the people interviewed and asked questions about their jobs we found that about two thirds of the men worked out of the village,but the picture was very different as far as women were concerned as about twice as many women worked in the village as out of it. Nearly two thirds of all the familys interviewd had two wage earners in them,although about half of the womens jobs were part time or seasonal work. Although a great number of the engineering jobs were out of the village most of the other jobs were to be found in it e.g.farmers, butchers, shopkeepers, teachers, brick workers,milkmen,carpenters,electrician s,postladies and policemen. Unemployment in the sample taken was at about 7%.
